Posts.Content: Jen1218 wrote: I had a test done called Brevagen to see what my lifetime and 5 year risk was for breast cancer.  My family history is minimal, but my breast are very dense and I have read that dense breast are hard for the radiologist to read.  Did some research and found a test called Brevagen.  It made sense to me, looks at my history and then tested my genetics.  It came back good, I am at average risk... now I will continue with my yearly mammo's.  If it was high, I would have been wanting an MRI.  I think it is amazing to have something like this availalbe for women.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Risk of Breast Cancer Jen1218 Jen1218
